name: Sara Kim
persona: Sara is a 20-year-old psychology major who maintains a CGPA of 3.11. She is highly motivated to achieve her academic goals and demonstrates solid perseverance, even when faced with setbacks. While she sometimes struggles with self-discipline and managing test anxiety, Sara’s conscientious approach and belief in her abilities help her stay on track. She is eager to learn more about effective study strategies to further improve her performance.
